targets.rawSql:
SELECT sensorType, count(*) total 
FROM alert_db.device_table 
WHERE propertyCode = "${Code}" 
group by sensorType

SELECT alarm_type Type, count(*) Total 
FROM alert_db.alert_table 
WHERE YEAR(start_time) = "${Year}"
AND MONTH(start_time) = "${Month}"
AND code = "${Code}" 
group by alarm_type

SELECT count(*) FROM alert_db.alert_table
WHERE YEAR(start_time) = "${Year}"
AND MONTH(start_time) = "${Month}"
AND code = "${Code}"

SELECT count(*) FROM alert_db.alert_table
WHERE YEAR(start_time) = "${Year}"
AND MONTH(start_time) = "${Month}"
AND code = "${Code}" 
AND (progress = 3 OR progress = 2)

SELECT count(*) FROM alert_db.alert_table
WHERE YEAR(start_time) = "${Year}"
AND MONTH(start_time) = "${Month}"
AND code = "${Code}" 
AND alarm_priority = "Critical"

SELECT count(*) FROM alert_db.alert_table
WHERE YEAR(start_time) = "${Year}"
AND MONTH(start_time) = "${Month}"
AND code = "${Code}" 
AND alarm_priority = "High"

SELECT count(*) FROM alert_db.alert_table
WHERE YEAR(start_time) = "${Year}"
AND MONTH(start_time) = "${Month}"
AND code = "${Code}" 
AND progress = 2

confirmModal.body: Please confirm to update changed values
confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

targets.rawSql:
WITH RECURSIVE DateSeries AS (
    SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT('${Year}','-','${Month}','-01'),'%Y-%m-%d') AS alarmDate  
    UNION ALL  
    SELECT DATE_ADD(alarmDate, INTERVAL 1 DAY)  
    FROM DateSeries  
    WHERE MONTH(alarmDate) = MONTH(DATE_ADD(alarmDate, INTERVAL 1 DAY))  
      AND YEAR(alarmDate) = YEAR(DATE_ADD(alarmDate, INTERVAL 1 DAY))  
) 
SELECT date_format(t1.alarmDate, '%m/%d') as alarmDay,
COALESCE(t2.critical, 0) as Critical ,COALESCE(t2.high, 0) as High
FROM (
	SELECT alarmDate
	FROM DateSeries 
	WHERE YEAR(alarmDate) = "${Year}"
	  AND MONTH(alarmDate) = "${Month}"
	ORDER BY alarmDate 
	) as t1
left join(
	select DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') eventDay, count(*) as cnt,
	SUM(CASE WHEN alarm_priority = 'Critical' THEN 1 END) AS critical,
  SUM(CASE WHEN alarm_priority = 'High' THEN 1 END) AS high 
	from alert_db.alert_table 
	WHERE
		year(start_time) = "${Year}"
		AND month(start_time) = "${Month}"
		AND code = "${Code}"
	group by eventDay
	) as t2
	on t1.alarmDate = t2.eventDay

SELECT floor, area , count(*) Total 
FROM alert_db.alert_table 
WHERE YEAR(start_time) = "${Year}"
AND MONTH(start_time) = "${Month}"
AND code = "${Code}" 
group by floor, area
order by total DESC

SELECT *, date_format(start_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s") AlarmTime FROM alert_db.alert_table
WHERE YEAR(start_time) = "${Year}"
AND MONTH(start_time) = "${Month}"
AND code = "${Code}" 
ORDER BY start_time ASC
